docs.text:
Welcome to FinMind


FinMind is about Financial Data, Visualize and Mining.


Introduce


Stocks are financial products that most people are familiar with. 
The stock price will be affected by many factors, 
including central bank interest rates, exchange rates, raw material prices, 
and international oil prices.


Similarly, other financial products will interact with each other. 
If we conduct a holistic financial analysis, 
we can not only look at a single piece of data, 
but also extract valuable information from it.




The following will introduce our products.


Financial Data




More than ten kinds financial data.




Financial Visualize




At least five kinds Visualize tools on every data. ( In development )




Financial Mining




Holistic financial analysis. ( In development )






Getting started


from FinMind.Data import Load

stock_id_list = Load.FinDataList(dataset = 'StockPrice')

data = Load.FinData(dataset = 'StockPrice',
                    select = stock_id_list[:2],
                    date = '2018-10-10')
print( data[:5] )

    Open   High    Low  Close  Adj_Close    Volume        date stock_id
0  38.10  38.60  37.00  37.60      37.60  38528047  2018-10-11     1101
1  37.25  39.00  37.00  39.00      39.00  16441006  2018-10-12     1101
2  38.55  38.75  38.10  38.50      38.50  13909633  2018-10-15     1101
3  38.40  38.40  37.80  38.20      38.20  12886506  2018-10-16     1101
4  38.60  38.90  38.15  38.25      38.25  10478677  2018-10-17     1101




The parameter 
table
 is what dataset been load.

The function 
FinDataList
 is load list of 
StockPrice
 dataset.

The function 
FinData
 is load stock prices by selecting stock_id_list[:2] and 
date
 >= '2018-10-10'. 

or you can load some stock id like 
2330
.



from FinMind.Data import Load

data = Load.FinData(dataset = 'StockPrice',
                    select = '2330',
                    date = '2018-10-10')
print( data[:5] )
    Open   High    Low  Close  Adj_Close    Volume        date stock_id
0  233.5  233.5  227.0  227.5      227.5  94589657  2018-10-11     2330
1  233.5  233.5  227.0  227.5      227.5  94589657  2018-10-11     2330
2  231.0  237.0  229.0  237.0      237.0  47175769  2018-10-12     2330
3  231.0  237.0  229.0  237.0      237.0  47175769  2018-10-12     2330
4  234.0  234.0  230.5  230.5      230.5  42168280  2018-10-15     2330



select
 can been input string or list.

docs.title: Getting started

docs.text:
Introduce




Taiwan Stock Information


Taiwan Stock Prices 


Taiwan Stock Financial Statements 


Taiwan Stock Stock Dividend 


Taiwan Stock Institutional Investors Buy and Sell 


Crude Oil Prices


Exchange Rate


Interest Rate


Gold Price


Government bond


Energy Futures Prices


Gold Price






Methods




FinDataList






FinDataList(dataset)




Load Data List from dataset.


Arguments






dataset
 : 
    String. 




StockPrice
 : Taiwan Stock Price.


FinancialStatements
 : Taiwan Stock Financial Statements.


StockDividend
 : Taiwan Stock Stock Dividend.


InstitutionalInvestors
 : Taiwan Stock Institutional Investors Buy and Sell.


CrudeOilPrices
 : Crude Oil Prices.


ExchangeRate
 : Exchange Rate.


InterestRate
 : Interest Rate.


GovernmentBonds
 : Government bond.


EnergyFuturesPrices
 : Energy Futures Prices.




The detail can follow Data Introduction.








Return : 
 List.







FinData






FinData(dataset,select,date)




Load Data from dataset.


Arguments






dataset
 : 
    String. 




StockInfo
 : Taiwan Stock Information.


StockPrice
 : Taiwan Stock Price.


FinancialStatements
 : Taiwan Stock Financial Statements.


StockDividend
 : Taiwan Stock Stock Dividend.


InstitutionalInvestors
 : Taiwan Stock Institutional Investors Buy and Sell.


CrudeOilPrices
 : Crude Oil Prices.


ExchangeRate
 : Exchange Rate.


InterestRate
 : Interest Rate.


GovernmentBonds
 : Government bond.


EnergyFuturesPrices
 : Energy Futures Prices.


GoldPrice
 : Gold Price.




The detail can follow Data Introduction.






select
 : 
    String or List. 
    Only been input element from 
FinDataList
.






date
 : 
    String. 
    Input type : 'year-month-days' ( e.g : '2017-03-05' )








Return : 
 DataFrame.





Data Introduction






StockInfo
 : 
More than 1000 stock.






StockPrice
 : 
All of stock price of stockinfo. The date started in 1992.

Cotain 
date, Trading_Volume, Trading_money, open, max, min, close, spread, Trading_turnover.






FinancialStatements
 : 
All of Financial Statements of stockinfo.




REV : Gross Revenue 


COST : Cost of Goods Sold or Manufacturing


PRO : Gross Profit 


GM : Gross margin 


OE : Operating Expenses 


OI : Operating Income 


OIM( Operating Profit Margin 


BTAX( Income before Tax


BTAXM( Income before Tax Margin 


TAX( Income Tax Expense 


NI( Net Income 


NIM( Net Profit Margin


EPS( Earnings Per Share 








stock_id, year, quar, date.






StockDividend
 : 
Containing all of Stock Dividend of stockinfo.






InstitutionalInvestors
 : 






CrudeOilPrices
 : 






ExchangeRate
 : 






InterestRate
 : 






GovernmentBonds
 : 






EnergyFuturesPrices
 : 






GoldPrice
 :

docs.title: Introduce

docs.text:
FinDataList(dataset)  
Load Data List from dataset.  Arguments    dataset  : 
    String.    StockPrice  : Taiwan Stock Price.  FinancialStatements  : Taiwan Stock Financial Statements.  StockDividend  : Taiwan Stock Stock Dividend.  InstitutionalInvestors  : Taiwan Stock Institutional Investors Buy and Sell.  CrudeOilPrices  : Crude Oil Prices.  ExchangeRate  : Exchange Rate.  InterestRate  : Interest Rate.  GovernmentBonds  : Government bond.  EnergyFuturesPrices  : Energy Futures Prices.   The detail can follow Data Introduction.     Return :   List.
docs.title: FinDataList

docs.text:
FinData(dataset,select,date)  
Load Data from dataset.  Arguments    dataset  : 
    String.    StockInfo  : Taiwan Stock Information.  StockPrice  : Taiwan Stock Price.  FinancialStatements  : Taiwan Stock Financial Statements.  StockDividend  : Taiwan Stock Stock Dividend.  InstitutionalInvestors  : Taiwan Stock Institutional Investors Buy and Sell.  CrudeOilPrices  : Crude Oil Prices.  ExchangeRate  : Exchange Rate.  InterestRate  : Interest Rate.  GovernmentBonds  : Government bond.  EnergyFuturesPrices  : Energy Futures Prices.  GoldPrice  : Gold Price.   The detail can follow Data Introduction.    select  : 
    String or List. 
    Only been input element from  FinDataList .    date  : 
    String. 
    Input type : 'year-month-days' ( e.g : '2017-03-05' )     Return :   DataFrame.
